name: 黄金矿工大冒险
description:
"Gold Miner Adventure" is a cartoon-style casual game. Players need to control their claws to catch gold, and they can pass the level after reaching certain points.
At the beginning of the game, the claws controlled by the player will constantly change the angle. When you feel that the angle of the claws is just pointing to the position of the gold mine, press the claws to catch the gold mine.
The bigger the gold mine, the heavier the weight, and the longer it takes to grab it. Therefore, it is necessary to determine whether the gold mine can be recovered in the remaining time of the game.
【Game Operation】
Throwing claws: up button
Throw a bomb: down button
【Game Features】
Although the game is simple, you need to master a certain rhythm and find the best time to throw your claws out in order to catch the gold mine. Be sure to catch enough gold mines in the specified time class to pass the level!
